title: Плавучий университет
overview: The project tells about the research of climate and ecosystem, about the state of the human body in Arctic conditions.The research vessel "Professor Molchanov" rarely stands at the pier. Now for 3 weeks it is to become the Arctic floating university. The expedition route passes through the White, Barents and Kara seas. The team will go on a scientific journey to the distant lands of a unique natural zone.
